A-Z Z-A Longest Shortest
"Section - %1$s" Section %1$s No. of sections: "No. of events:" "Point at %1$s." "Point at
%1$s."1 "Type:" "Nuisance:" "Difficulty:" "Picturesque:" "Cleanliness:" "km" "Total length" We use location data to handle better navigation on the Path's map. this permission is not required. Map Path List
We utilise location data to better portray path's events in relation to location information. your location is never sent anywhere and we don't saved any location information in our aplication/servers. Request permission Paths Checklist Download Paths data! Don't forget a thing on your next Adventure!!! List item Separator Note Title Checklist Item Check all items Uncheck all items
About About this App! This application aims to recreate kajak.org.pl functionality that contained several river path descriptions throughout Poland. all data was provided by original owner.

 OpenSource for the win!!!

 if you want to contribute go to github.com/czerwix/KajakOrg or contact me via email provided below

 if you want to update paths or edit any mistakes please contact me via email below or github/linkedin. I have no clue what ZWA,ZWB...,WWII or U1,U2...,U6 and *,**,*** mean! Learn more here Application created by: Szymon Kraus email: czerwiiii@gmail.com Big Thanks to all of the path description authors!!! Path description authors: All path data is direct copy of www.kajak.org.pl Check out my other stuff! Find out more here! check out Amazing Photos! join the project! %.0f km From %1.0fkm - %2.0fkm. Section length:%3.0fkm
